ABOUT US

Precision From Above

Survey-grade aerial data for Southern California. We capture precise, actionable intelligence from the sky so you can make informed decisions with confidence.

The Pilot Behind the Data

I'm Dan, an FAA Part 107 certified commercial drone pilot based in Southern California. For years, I've been obsessed with one thing: precision. Whether it's capturing survey-grade data or delivering insights that matter, accuracy isn't optional—it's foundational.

Vantage Point exists because I believe clients deserve better. Not opinions, not estimates, not guesswork. Real data. Data you can trust to drive decisions.

"We provide the data. You make the decisions."

That's our positioning. We're a data provider first, and that's where our focus stays.
